11113.content:
"*Huff!* not so *Huff!* fast!" Sonic called.

He stopped running, or rather semi-waddling, and placed his hand against a tree, resting, breathing heavily and sweating. Tails, who was flying in the air like a helicopter by his rotating twin tails, floated down to his exhausted friend.

"Come on, Sonic!" he encouraged, "Your almost there! Just little bit further."

Sonic looked up the hill, dismayed about how far he still had to go. "Not sure I'll make it..."

"If you make it to the top," said Tails slyly, "I'll make you a chilly-dog."

By the mere mention of his favorite snack, the blue hedgehog grew more enthusiastic. To be honest, anything involving junk food and not having to move all day was enough to grab Sonic's attention.

Life on the planet of Mobius have been slow. It has been a while since the evil Dr.Eggmam plotted anything and, growing bored from running the same paths day after day without any excitement, Sonic had grown lax.

And obese. The blue hedgehog's body was resembling more the Michelin man these days than his typical bulbous form.

Sonic's belly jetted out before him by one foot, a doughy thing that spilled over his waist and almost reached his knees, decorated by lovehandles on his sides.

On top of this sack of fat was his well defined moobs, and above them rested his two chins. His arms resembled that of sausages and his thighs as thick as tree trunks.

Though their diameter regressed as it approached his feet, his legs were still thick enough to put some strain on his socks, causing it to tear in some places.

Sonic had gotten severely out of shape, and his friends was determined to get him fit again, no matter how brutal it would be. They feared the day he would end up unable to defend Mobius against their nemesis...

"Let's go!" said Sonic enthusiastically, and began to semi-waddle as fast as he could.

On top of the hill, holding a stopwatch and eating a taco, was Knuckles, watching as the duo came up the hill.

"Nearly half an hour," he said when the finally reached the finish line, "That's five minutes more than your last time. You're getting slow, bud."

Sonic, who looked ready to pass out from exhaustion, sat down, his body asking like jello.

He gave Knuckles a sharp glare and said, "Cut me some slack, man. It's not like you're in the best shape either."

Knuckles only chuckled and said, "Whatever."

But deep down he knew what Sonic meant. Life on Mobius has been slow and boring for him as well. He was gaining weight too, but unlike the corpulent blue hedgehog he hid it better.

He snacked in private and sucked in his developing belly most of the time. Knuckles really didn't want to go through the torture Sonic was experiencing.

"So, where's my chilly-dog?" Sonic asked Tails after he rested.

But the fox only shook his head. "Sorry, Sonic, but you can't have one," he said, "You need to avoid them to stay in shape."

"So you lied to me?" Sonic said accusingly.

"I had to," said Tails, smiling apologetically, "You couldn't give up on me at that last stretch. I had to use some kind of encouragement. Can't blame me for that."

Sonic sighed. "I guess you're right," he said.

"But that doesn't mean you can get a diet soda," said Tails, handing him a can.

Sonic smiled and accepted the soda happily, saying, "I guess I should be grateful for that at least."

They went home, knowing little that someone was plotting something against them.

Who was it and what was the plan?
11113.title: Sonic the (out of shape) hedghog.

11212.content:
It was late at night, but Tails was still busy sitting in front of his desk, working on a contraption, blue light flashing as he welded the metals together.

He stopped, yawned and rubbed his sore eyes. His stomach began to rumble, and he rubbed his bulging gut.

Tails looked at the clock and saw, to his mild surprise, that it was almost midnight. "Well, I guess I can take a break," he said to himself and jumped off the chair.

The kitchen was dark and silent, except for the light streaming out of the fridge. As tails looked for anything to eat, his larger than usual rump and twin tails the only thing sticking out of the fridge, he was unaware of a hulking figure approaching.

"Hey, it looks like I'm not the only one looking for a midnight snack."

Tails jumped, bumping his head, dropping the armful of food he was gathering.

"Sorry," Knuckles apologized, grinning sheepishly.

"It's okay," said Tails, rubbing his head.

The fox then began to gather the food again, and Knuckles noted the large quantity.

"Are you going to make a sandwich or lay out a buffy?" he joked.

"Oh, this? No, no, it's just...well, to get me through the night. You know me. I like spend my time inventing stuff, so I need to keep my energy up."

It was a weak excuse, Knuckles knew. Of late, the fox had been gorging more and more food.

"And it shows," he commented both to himself and Tails.

The fat fox blushed. He hated it when Knuckles teased him about his increasing weight, yet it was true. He was getting pretty fat of late with nothing to do but sit all day, eat and invent things.

It was a shame as well, seeing that everyone was adopting a more athletic lifestyle of late. The girls were getting into gymnastics, Sonic added an extra 20 kilometers to his 30 kilometers run, and even Knuckles worked out more often, looking even beefier now.

And here he was, getting wider every passing day...but not for long, he knew. Tails was working at the moment on something that would help him lose weight much quicker.

He didn't need to run or diet. Science would fix his problem! Excusing himself, he left to finish his work.

But as he left, Knuckles watched him, sometching blooming inside him he couldn't quite explain.

He didn't dislike it that Tails was gaining weight, and that bothered him. Being the extremely athletic type, he knew he was supposed to be repulsed by this.

He wasn't. In fact, he was fascinated by how Tails was growing. For some reason, he wanted him even bigger!

Knuckles shook his head, shook the thought away. No, he can't think that. What was wrong with him? He decided that it will go away eventually if he ignored this bizarre urge.

Little did he know that things will be far different in the coming future.

12221.content:
Outside in a wide field, Cream was with Tails and an large air tank. It seemed like Cream was going to be a test subject for one of Tails's experiments.

"Okay Cream, are you ready?" Tails asked.
"What's this experiment for again?" Cream asked.
"It's to test this next type of air I created." Tails said. "The compounds in it are much different than regular air. I wanted to see how it would affect you compared to regular air. I hope you don't mind being inflated a bit."
"Sure. It sounds like fun." Cream said happily.

Cream then grabbed the hose and put it in her mouth.

"Ready." Cream said giving a thumbs up.
"Okay." Tails said.

Tails went to the tank and turn the knob lightly, unleashing the air into the hose and into Cream. Cream starts to feel the air pressure inside her body and her belly starts to slowly stretch out. More and more so. Her belly starts to get rounder and rounder. Soon her undies started to show and the same for her belly button.

Tails turned the tank off when Cream was looking like a inflated bunny ball.

"How to do you feel, Cream?" Tails asked.
"Hehe! That was fun." Cream said happily. "I feel fine. My belly doesn't even feel tight."
"Interesting." Tails said as he writes in a clipboard.
"Say Tails?" Cream asked. "Is it okay if I...."

124321.content:
"Long time no see!"

Blaze looked up from the fruit stand she had been shopping at to see a familiar figure bounding toward her. She sighed. While not exactly a social butterfly, Blaze was perfectly friendly, but when she had set out to go shopping, the last person she wanted to run into was Rouge.

"Hello..." Blaze sighed. She had no real reason to hate the bat, she hardly knew her to be perfectly honest, but while being a princess had granted Blaze many things in her life, there was one thing Rouge had that Blaze was never able to attain. Two things, actually.

"Fancy seeing you here!" Rouge smiled, crossing her arms in such a way that her already impressive chest pushed out even more, "How are you, sweetie?"

"Fine..." Blaze muttered, trying and failing to take her eyes off of Rouge's figure. She swore the bat got curvier every time she saw her.

"Find something you like, or just browsing?" Rouge winked, catching onto Blaze's prying eyes and grabbing her breasts to show them off even more.

Blaze felt a blush spread across her face, she'd been caught red handed. "I...Ah..." She stammered.

Frozen with embarrassment, she could only watch as a playful grin spread across Rouge's face, and the woman took hold of Blaze's free hand. Before Blaze could protest, her hand was yanked into Rouge's chest, and vanished into the cleavage.

"Wh-what are you doing???" Blaze cried, completely taken aback by the public display

"Well, The other day I found something special..." Rouge started, "I'm not usually one to part with my gems, but..."

She pulled out Blaze's hand, and the cat realized that she'd taken hold of a necklace hidden within her bosoms.

"You probably need this more than I do..." Rouge finished. Before Blaze could ask about her behavior, the bat girl spread her wings and took off, shouting a final "Let me know how it goes!" before disappearing into the distance, leaving behind a very confused princess.

The necklace was quite pretty, a gold chain adorned with many sparkling gems, but it wasn't really Blaze's style. Still... The way the bat had looked at her... What was this necklace supposed to do, exactly?

Shrugging, Blaze fastened the chain around her neck and went back to her errands. It was just a piece of jewelry, after all. What's the worst that could happen?

124321121321.content:
The thought surprised Blaze, she would normally never think of such a thing.

"But... why not?" She smiled, well aware of the lemur's crush on her. This would be easy.

Her hips swayed seductively as she approached Tangle.

"Hey there, cutie..." she cooed,

"Blaze!" Tangle cried, as she turned to see her, a wide grin spreading across her face, "What's up-"

She blinked. Something was different about the cat. Not the she was complaining...

"Uhh, you on a new diet or somethin'?" She asked

"Listen, would you mind doing a favor for me?" Blaze asked, closing the distance between the two, "I need a new outfit, and you're the only person I could think of who could help me."

Tangle swallowed, she'd never been this close to the cat before. The request was strange, but come to think of it, Blaze's clothes did look a little tight on her. She could have sworn she remembered the cat having a flatter chest just a moment ago.

"O-oh, like shopping?" Tangle stammered, blushing, "Yeah, I can hang out..."

Blaze giggled and eyed the lemur. The took another step forward, placing a finger on Tangle's chest and slowly traching downward, sending shivers down Tangle's spine.

"Actually... I was thinking...you could take yours off?"
124321121321.title: Seduce Tangle out of her clothes then make off ...

1243211213211.content:
In the back of her head, Tangle knew something was wrong. She knew Blaze wasn't like this. But looking at her chest, Tangle's mind began to fog. Blaze...really was quite beautiful wasn't she? All her thoughts seemed to wash away, her mind in a trance.

"Yes, miss..." Tangle said, slowly beginning to remove her clothes.

"Good girl." Blaze smiled

Several minutes later...

It was somewhat difficult pulling on the black jumpsuit that once belonged to the skinny lemur, but Blaze couldn't help but love the way it looked on her, accentuating her curvy hips and her now b-cup chest.

Being the gracious master she was, she let Tangle have her old outfit. She had no need for the prudish garb anymore anyway. But what do with the lemur now?
1243211213211.title: The necklace begins to hypnotize Tangle

12432112132111.content:
Blaze strutted over to Tangle who was still in a daze thanks to the amulet. The cat swung her hips side to side as her breasts jiggled a little under her new tiny shirt and super tight jumpsuit. “Oh Tangle dear....” the cat turned the lemurs head to look at her cleavage and amulet.
Tangle drooled a bit at the sight, still in a trance “Yeah?”
“You love me don’t you?”
“Yes...”
“You love my new look?”
“Yeees..”
“You want to worship my curves!”
“Oh yes yes yes!” Tangle was more and more eager, she practically burried her head into Blazed chest and he kitty master pet her head softly.
“That’s good because you’re mine now... from now on you will be...”
12432112132111.title: Keep her as a slave

“Muh-Mindless?” Tangle drifted out of her trance slightly at that but Blaze putrred as she brought her in close.
“Yes tangle.... thinking is distracting you from my body..”
“Distracting.... your body...” Tangle mumbled
“You don’t need to think to love me... “
“Don’t need.... to think.” Tangles eyes dulled
“Your Mistress Blaze will tell you what to think...”
“Mistress.... tell me what to think.” The Lemur drooled and begged weakly
Blaze smiled and told her molding her brainless Servants new personality

Blaze pet Tangles head “You should relax and go along with everything, everything in the world is normal and cool as long as I’m in control.”

“You won’t be bothered by anything I do and you will convince others that it’s better to relax and let me decide everything for them.”
“Better... everything’s better when you’re in control..” Tangle mumbled into Blazes chest tickling the voluptuous overlord.
Blaze giggled and pulled Tangle up to look her in her eyes “I am your world, and you are my little Mellow Yellow Love Slave.”
Tangles expression turned Calm and happy “Oooh, Blaze... Everything’s so... awesome with you... what are we doing now?” She leaned on Blaze like she couldn’t stand on her own and ran a finger along Blazes breasts,
Blaze smiled as she looked to her completed slave... what next indeed.

info.brief_description: A typical wg inflation with a bit of growth and shrink
info.description:
ok this is a simple interactive where you get to mess with the bodies, and minds, of some of our favorite Sonic characters.
Rules:

no killing,
No changing gender,
Oc's must be minor characters,
have fun
no one choice chapters
